sentences.en: a dark formless danger, lurking in the shadows
sentences.cn: 一种潜藏在阴影里的无形危险

sentences.en: A fox was sneaking on the lurk.
sentences.cn: 一只狐狸正在偷偷摸摸地潜行窥探.

sentences.en: But problems lurk behind the determination.
sentences.cn: 但是该决定的背后隐藏着问题.

sentences.en: Dangers lurk in the path of wilderness.
sentences.cn: 在这条荒野的小路上隐伏着危险.

sentences.en: Dangers seem to lurk beneath this river.
sentences.cn: 这条河流潜藏许多危险.

sentences.en: Hidden dangers lurk in every family saloon car.
sentences.cn: 每部家庭式双排座小轿车都存在隐患。

sentences.en: Odd objects attract fire - never lurk behind one.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的物体吸引炮火 - 不要躲在这种东西后面.

sentences.en: Odd objects attract fire – never lurk behind one.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的物体吸引炮火-不要躲在这种东西后面.

sentences.en: Predators sometimes lurk in chat rooms.
sentences.cn: 聊天室有时也隐藏着心怀诡计的人.

sentences.en: Pride may lurk a threadbare cloak.
sentences.cn: 骄傲可能披著老一套的外套出现.

sentences.en: Pride may lurk under a threadbare cloak.
sentences.cn: 骄傲可能会潜藏在穿旧的斗篷下.

sentences.en: Pride may lurk under a threadbare not cloak.
sentences.cn: 骄傲估计披著老一套的外衣呈现.

sentences.en: Pride may lurk under threadbare cloak.
sentences.cn: 骄傲可能会躲藏在穿旧的斗篷下.

sentences.en: The hornets are the worst -- they often lurk outside the hives to rob the bees. "
sentences.cn: 你得提防虫子爬进来,还得提防大黄蜂.大黄蜂这贼最恶, 常常落在蜜蜂窝洞口. 专干坏事. ”

sentences.en: The sandbanks where the animals liked to lurk were dredged.
sentences.cn: 它们的藏身之处--沙洲,被挖泥船发掘.

sentences.en: They lurk on the kitchen sponge, your computer keyboard and the dirty laundry.
sentences.cn: 它们潜伏在厨房的洗碗布上、你的电脑键盘和脏衣服上。

sentences.en: We still dwell in the Valley of the Shadow, lurk in its desolate places, peering from brambles and thickets at its mad, malign inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 我们依旧在影子的峡谷里生存，埋伏在荒凉的地方，从荆棘和丛林中凝视着，去诽谤那里的居民。

sentences.en: What dark forms lurk in the mists of the Carina Nebula?
sentences.cn: 什么暗影隐藏在船底座星云朦胧的雾中?

trans.tran_en: to wait somewhere quietly and secretly, usually because you are going to do something wrong

trans.tran_cn: 潜伏，埋伏，潜藏，潜在，偷偷地行动
